parts:
How do I grant access to my Google tools?

---

What my team needs:

Kindly assist to grant admin access to these emails: 
seosupport@mm.com.sg
semsupport@mm.com.sg
semsupport3@mm.com.sg

We’ll need access for 
- Google Analytics 
- ⁠Google Tag Manager
- ⁠Google Search Console
- ⁠Google Ads (we’ll need your assistance to share the 10 digit code for this)

Here's a **precise, step-by-step guide** to grant admin access to your Google tools (Google Analytics, Tag Manager, Search Console, and Google Ads):

---

## 1. **Google Analytics (GA4)**

**A. Log in** to [Google Analytics](https://analytics.google.com/).

**B.** Click **Admin** (bottom left).

**C.** Under "Account" or "Property" (choose the level you want to grant access to), click **Access Management**.

**D.** Click the **"+"** (Add) > **Add users**.

**E.** Enter the emails:
- seosupport@mm.com.sg
- semsupport@mm.com.sg
- semsupport3@mm.com.sg

**F.** Tick **Administrator** under permissions.

**G.** Click **Add**.

---

## 2. **Google Tag Manager**

**A. Log in** to [Google Tag Manager](https://tagmanager.google.com/).

**B.** Select the container you want to share.

**C.** Click **Admin** (left menu), then **User Management**.

**D.** Click the **"+"** (Add) > **Add users**.

**E.** Enter the emails above.

**F.** Under **Container Permissions**, select **Administrator**.

**G.** Click **Invite**.

---

## 3. **Google Search Console**

**A. Log in** to [Google Search Console](https://search.google.com/search-console/).

**B.** Select the property (website) you want to share.

**C.** Click **Settings** (left menu), then **Users and permissions**.

**D.** Click **Add user** (top right).

**E.** Enter the emails, and set permission to **Full**.

**F.** Click **Add**.

---

## 4. **Google Ads**

### **To add users:**

**A. Log in** to [Google Ads](https://ads.google.com/).

**B.** Click the **Tools & settings** icon (wrench) > **Access and security**.

**C.** Click the **"+"** (plus) to add users.

**D.** Enter the emails above.

**E.** Choose **Admin** as the access level.

**F.** Click **Send invitation**.

---

### **To share your 10-digit Google Ads account code:**

1. Log in to [Google Ads](https://ads.google.com/).
2. At the top right, you'll see your account name and a 10-digit ID (format: xxx-xxx-xxxx).
3. Copy and send this code to your team.

---

**Note:**  
- The invited users will get an email invitation from Google. They must accept to activate access.
- You must have admin rights to perform these steps.  
- Some changes (e.g., in Search Console) may require site ownership/verification.

---

### **If you want a template reply to your team, here's one:**

---

**Hi team,**

I've granted admin access to the following emails for all required Google tools:

- seosupport@mm.com.sg  
- semsupport@mm.com.sg  
- semsupport3@mm.com.sg

You should receive invitations for Google Analytics, Tag Manager, Search Console, and Google Ads shortly.  
Our Google Ads account ID is: **[your 10-digit code here]**.

Let me know if you encounter any issues.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

---

Let me know if you need screenshots, further clarification, or automation suggestions.
